casebody.data:
DIAZ
v.
DIVISION OF SOCIAL SERVICES. No. 523PA04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 15, 2005. Melanie M. Hamilton, Thomas E. Cone, Wendell H. Ott, Greensboro, for Diaz.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th day of March 2005 by Respondent for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Respondent (Divison of Social Services, et al) shall have up to and including the 4th day of May 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 15th day of March 2005."
